scripts.vercel-build: echo 'Expo version:' && npx expo --version && echo 'Starting expo export' && npx expo export:web --dev || echo 'Expo export failed'
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Checking dist contents' && ls -la dist || echo 'ERROR: dist directory not found'
scripts.check-expo: echo 'Checking expo-cli' && npx expo --version || echo 'expo-cli not found'
